snippet: For public schools, which get half their money from property taxes, some districts get to keep sudden riches, but others don’t.
lead_paragraph: For public schools, which get half their money from property taxes, some districts get to keep sudden riches, but others don’t.

headline.seo: For Texas Schools, Wealth Doesn’t Always Mean More
headline.main: In School Finance Tangle, Wealth Doesn’t Necessarily Mean More
headline.print_headline: In School Finance Tangle, Wealth Doesn’t Necessarily Mean More
